_start_streaming_button_text.comment: Text for action button that starts streaming
_stop_streaming_button_text.comment: Text for action button that stops streaming
custom_streaming_config_page_description: Custom streaming is your tool to stream out Teams meeting to public platforms powered by RTMP
_custom_streaming_config_page_descriptio: App description on the custom streaming config page
_custom_streaming_config_page_first_gree: First greeting on the custom streaming config page
_custom_streaming_config_page_second_gre: Second greeting on the custom streaming config page
custom_streaming_error_meeting_limit_rea: This meeting cannot be streamed in its current settings. Please restrict attendees to under 1000.
_custom_streaming_error_meeting_limit_re: Error message when streaming is not supported for meetings with > 1000 attendees
custom_streaming_error_permission_denied: You don't have streaming permissions. Please contact your IT administrator or the organizer to stream this content
_custom_streaming_error_permission_denie: Error message when user does not have permission to stream due to either policy being disabled or streaming not enabled for the user role
custom_streaming_error_outdated_client: Teams needs updates to continue. Restart your application to ensure you have the latest features.
Error message when user is on an outdated client which does not support streaming
custom_streaming_error_unknown: Something went wrong, please try again.
_custom_streaming_error_unknown.comment: Generic error message when streaming fails due to some unexpected reason
custom_streaming_error_unsupported_platf: This feature isn't supported in the browser yet. Try again from the desktop version of Teams.
_custom_streaming_error_unsupported_plat: Error message when user is on an unsupported platform (browser for now as streaming is only supported in Desktop client)
_custom_streaming_tab_title.comment: Title for custom streaming app tab in calling screen top toolbar
